vsParam:
Oh no, Logy... Wow!?
Your room is so clean and tidy!

Ah ha ha, we are sorry. The door is open, so...
Uh? What are these documents?

Ah, this is the report about the investigation, Headmaster Jones
Wort asked me to do it. I was just going to submit it to him...

Oh, what's the investigation about?
Let me see it, just one look!

Yeah, sure.
It's not some unpresentable stuff.

Wow, what's this document!?
It's so hard to understand!
Is it? It's just an ordinary report?

O, ordinary? But, this report drafted with assignments is one
level higher than ours in terms of both quality and quantity...

The report has a fixed form.
You can make one nice report just by imitating the form.
Do you even have a clear understanding of your personality?

You handle everything perfectly.
Just look at your room.

Every corner is perfect.
Even the floor is spotlessly clean!

It is related to personality. Although there is a fixed form,
it's not easy to produce something as wonderful as yours...

I don't think it's that hard... Never mind.
I am going to submit this report, I'll walk you out.

Hmm... Logy always strikes me as inflexible...
Does he not want to befriend us...

He's very kind to us, it doesn't look like it...
Perhaps he just needs a chance...

A chance... Right! Listen to me!
How about we give some cleaning tools to Logy?

I am sure he'll like it given that
he pays so much attention to hygiene!

You are right! Let's make some simple
cleaning tools, [px]!

Logy! Please accept these!
I think they'll be useful for you!

These are for me? Thank you. They seem pretty handy.
Did [px] make all these with alchemy?

The appearance and quality of these tools are very good. I can
tell that [px]'s very good at alchemy. I'll treasure them.
Yeah! Hee hee, do you like them?

Of course.
... Right, I've meaning to ask you.

Why are you so good to me? I come from a different world,
if you are good to me because of that...

Uh... There's no reason...
We just want to be your friends!

Yes! And we prepared this gift for you
to make you happy...

Ah! But I think we might came a bit strong,
did we cause you some trouble?

No, it's not like I don't want
to become friends with you guys. It's just...

I always worry that I can't get along
with you in this new environment...

What? Why would you even worry about that!
You have become our friend a long time ago!

C, comrade again?
I feel like I just become your comrade unconditionally...

Ha ha! What condition do you think is needed for comradeship♪
That's right. All we need is to establish a relationship, right?

But, this is pretty easy.
We stay friendly to and help each other, that's it!

Yeah! So Logy is also our comrade!
You don't need to say thank you to your comrades!

Ha ha, this is funny,
this is just like the development team I used to work for.

In this case...
I might live here comfortably...
